channel.title: CS3 on Vista!?
channel.description:
Ahamgad!! Okay I downloaded the free trial for Photosop CS3 and ran it. It extracted all the stuff into a folder on my desktop. Then made me run the setup .. so i went into the folder and found the setup, ran it and then it waited for a second and this window flashed up for less then a second... then nothing. Didn't get installed or anything.
I'm using Vista Home Premium (which sucks so bad) and i need photoshop on this computer!!! NEED!!!

item.title: CS3 on Vista!?
item.dc:creator: @Javacisnotrecognized _^_
item.description:
@Javacisnotrecognized wrote:

Right click on it, choose “Compatibility” and then set that to a different version of windows.

Read full topic
